name: Freetring
overview: Freetring is an revolutionary calling service that is absolutely free. No restrictions, no hidden charges, just free calls plus tons of additional features. In Freetring, you can get free calls that you can use from your landline, mobile, or even your computer, to anywhere. Freetring.com offers several features that set it apart from the other free call providers. Freetring allows phone-to-phone calls and PC to phone calls and also features pin-less dialing, speed dial, and mobile softphones â€“ all these perks are available for absolutely no charge. Once you set up an account with Freetring, you can start calling anyone in any part of the world, whether landline or mobile, for free. Only free credits are required to make these calls. Earning these free credits is also very easy and simple. Freetring offers many ways for its users to earn credits. Earn by just watching our videos, participating in our surveys, or taking part in our daily deals. Freetring also gives free credits for calling when you do e-mail submissions, registrations, and sign-ups with our partner sites. Users can also spread the word about freetring to others to earn them free credits. There are a lot of ways to earn these free credits, and you can check them out by visiting Freetring.com. If you have tried a similar service with freetring, you might think that these methods for earning free credits are only available to particular countries only. What makes Freetring.com different from the other sites is that Freetring has offers from every country - not just the United States, Canada, or the United Kingdom. They also have offers for countries as far as India, so users need not worry about the availability of surveys because Freetring has it covered. As simple as completing Freetringâ€™s surveys will earn you free credits that you can use to call anyone at anytime, anywhere. This is a Freetring guarantee. If you complete a survey 100% and you were not given free credits due, just show them a proof of completion like screenshots, and they will award you the free credits you deserve. You might also think, â€œSince itâ€™s free, it must be of low quality.â€ However, in Freetring, they know how it is like to be apart from someone you love. Hearing from your loved ones from the other side of the world means a lot. That is why Freetring offers this service to you without the usual international direct dial fees that rob your wallet, without compromising the quality despite the free charge. In Freetring, you do simple tasks for them, and in return, they offer you free quality calls. Freetring is currently running on beta. Join Freetring now and become a part of them! You can share with them your suggestions and ideas about the service - your input will be very much valued and will help them improve and provide a better experience for everyone. Soon, they will be introducing more features and surprises to their members. What are you waiting for? Sign up at Freetring.com now to enjoy your free calls.
